title: How did Decoder Ring do it?!
content:
Hello!

I navigated my way over to [http://thedecoderring.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201052228/http:/thedecoderring.com/ "http://thedecoderring.com") to see what The Decoder Ring Design Concern had crackin' and noticed this HUGE "HELLO!" Here's my question: is there an easy way to do the 3D letter thing? I know that it's possible to do in Illustrator with the 3D "tool", but the type isn't forward facing anymore.

Help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201052228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/home_splash_3_4152.gif)
author: Dubtron9000
